# Frankford

Use the CUDA system to fit multiple datasets simultaneously using the Levenbergâ€“Marquardt algorithm.

## Documentation

For more infomation see <https://frankford.readthedocs.io>

## Installation

To install see <https://pypi.org/project/frankford>
